ProteinName	Hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase-like protein 2 (EC 1.-.-.-) (Short chain dehydrogenase/reductase family 13C member 1)

Length	418
Function	Has apparently no steroid dehydrogenase activity (PubMed:19703561). Controls bile acid (BA) and lipid metabolism in response to nutritional cues (PubMed:38820148).
Subcellular Location	Peroxisome; Mitochondrion
